name: @flowcatalyst/flowcatalyst
description: FlowCatalyst - Unified app with Platform, Message Router, and Stream Processor

scripts.build:full: pnpm --filter @flowcatalyst/platform-frontend build && pnpm run build && cp -r ../platform-frontend/dist ./dist/frontend
scripts.build:sea: pnpm --filter @flowcatalyst/platform-frontend build && tsup && node scripts/pack-migrations.js && node scripts/pack-frontend.js && node --experimental-sea-config sea-config.json && node scripts/build-sea.js
